author: Carina García
title: "Tengo las manos limpias" asegura exedil de Santa Lucía del Camino, Oaxaca; notificación de SAT lo contradice
text:
A través de un oficio, la Secretaría de Hacienda y Crédito Público, notificó al municipio de Santa Lucía del Camino sobre el adeudo que pesa en su contra por conceptos del Impuesto Sobre la Renta (ISR), mismo que dejó de pagar el expresidente Dante Montaño Montero, hoy diputado local del Partido del Trabajo (PT).
Aunque el integrante de la Comisión Permanente de Agua, Saneamiento y Hacienda de la LXIV Legislatura, negó haber dejado deuda alguna y exigió pruebas, el organismo federal estableció que durante su trienio en dicho municipio dejó de pagar más de tres millones de pesos. En el oficio, enviado al municipio de Santa Lucía del Camino, el organismo federal estableció que durante los años 2021, último año del trienio del ahora diputado petista, no fue pagado el ISR, por un concepto de más de tres millones de pesos.
“Tenemos las manos limpias “, dijo Montaño Montero pese a la notificación de la Secretaría de Hacienda que revela su deuda con el organismo; de acuerdo a las autoridades actuales el diputado del PT, cobró el ISR a los trabajadores pero no pagó al organismo federal.
Ante ello, el Cabildo de Santa Lucía encabezado por Juan Carlos García Márquez presentó ante la Fiscalía General de la República (FGR), las denuncias correspondientes por tratarse de un delito federal. Fue denunciado además, el priista y expresidente Raúl Cruz, por no pagar el ISR durante su trienio y que sumaría más de seis millones de pesos; por lo que entre ambas exadministraciones municipales dejaron un quebranto de nueve millones de pesos; con recargos 10 millones de pesos.
LA

author: Anaid Diego
title: Cómo recibir el Año Nuevo en armonía, según el Feng Shui | MVS Noticias
text: Estamos a sólo unos días de despedir este 2023, es por ello que, si tú eres una de las personas que quiere iniciar con el pie derecho este 2024, debes saber que existe un método creado por el [Feng Shui](https://mvsnoticias.com/tendencias/2023/12/27/rituales-de-feng-shui-para-atraer-la-buena-suerte-en-2024-620153.html) que te podrá ayudar con tu propósito. De acuerdo con los expertos, llevar a cabo las siguientes tareas te ayudarán a mantener la armonía en tu hogar, una energía limpia y permitirás la entrada de la felicidad y la prosperidad. Recomendaciones del Feng Shui para recibir el año en armonía El Feng Shui recomienda organizar los espacios de tu casa. En caso de no tener el suficiente tiempo para hacerlo en todo el inmueble, es recomendable elegir 1 o 2 habitaciones y enfocarse en cambiar su aspecto. Por ejemplo, tu recámara, la sala o la entrada principal. Te podría interesar Al hacer la limpieza de los espacios, trata de guardar todo lo que no es necesario que tengas a la mano y cerciórate que las habitaciones estén bien iluminadas; si lo deseas puedes añadir algunas velas o veladoras para atraer más energía. Con el uso de las nuevas tecnologías es muy común que acumulemos en nuestras computadoras o teléfonos información que realmente no utilizamos o que no sabemos de su existencia, es por ello que el Feng Shui te recomienda también hacer una limpieza de estos aparatos electrónicos con el objetivo de iniciar el año renovado en todos los aspectos. Te podría interesar Para ello revisar todos los archivos, depurar aplicaciones o programas obsoletos, borra imágenes y haz un respaldo de lo que es realmente importante. Además de la limpieza física y digital el Feng Shui recomienda a las personas saldar sus deudas, terminar conversaciones o trabajos que se hayan quedado pendientes para iniciar el año con una energía renovada, lista para enfrentar nuevos desafíos. Ritual de limpieza para Fin de Año según el Feng Shui - Limpia con anticipación tu hogar. De acuerdo con la tradición limpias el primer día del año provocarás que se vaya la “buena fortuna”. Al hacer la limpieza es recomendable iniciar de arriba hacia abajo, es decir primero techos y ventanas y por último el piso. - Elimina objetos y muebles que no utilizas: Elije qué de todos los objetos de tu hogar ya no necesitas, colócalos en una bolsa y deshazte de ellos cuanto antes para evitar que la energía se estanque. - El Feng Shui recomienda barrer hacia afuera para ayudar a renovar la energía. Si lo deseas puedes abrir las ventanas para que exista una mayor circulación. Al terminar, no dejes ningún utensilio de limpieza a la vista Ahora ya lo sabes, si quieres iniciar el 2024 con energía renovada, sigue estas indicaciones del Feng Shui, reacomoda tus espacios y permite la entrada de energía nueva.

author: LupitaHaro
title: Pronostican en Sinaloa temperaturas de hasta 45°C este 10 de mayo
text: [Culiacán](https://www.debate.com.mx/sinaloa/seccion/culiacan/) ¡Ay, mamá, me estoy quemando! Sinaloa se sofoca con temperaturas superiores a 45°C este 10 de mayo Un sofocante Día de las Madres se espera en la mayor parte de las regiones de Sinaloa, con temperaturas que pueden superar los 45°C, informa la Conagua [ASE y CEAIP hacen alianza por la transparencia y la rendición de cuentas en Sinaloa](https://www.debate.com.mx/sinaloa/culiacan/ASE-y-CEAIP-hacen-alianza-por-la-transparencia-y-la-rendicion-de-cuentas-en-Sinaloa-20240509-0074.html) [Estas son las RUTAS ALTERNAS por obra de túnel en la salida norte de Culiacán](https://www.debate.com.mx/sinaloa/culiacan/Estas-son-las-RUTAS-ALTERNAS-por-obra-de-tunel-en-la-salida-norte-de-Culiacan-20240509-0060.html) [Apagones en Sinaloa: Congreso pide a la CFE atender fallas en comunidades de la zona sur](https://www.debate.com.mx/sinaloa/culiacan/Apagones-en-Sinaloa-Congreso-pide-a-la-CFE-atender-fallas-en-comunidades-de-la-zona-sur-20240509-0052.html) [Aprueba Congreso de Sinaloa licencia menstrual a burócratas estatales y municipales](https://www.debate.com.mx/sinaloa/culiacan/Aprueba-Congreso-de-Sinaloa-licencia-menstrual-a-burocratas-estatales-y-municipales-20240509-0053.html) Este viernes 10 de mayo se celebra en México el Día de las Madres, donde las familias aprovechan la fecha para reunirse en casa o salen a comer a restaurantes, pero para este día se pronostican temperaturas superiores a 45°C en diferentes estados, incluido [Sinaloa](https://www.debate.com.mx/sinaloa/). De acuerdo al informe del Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (SMN), de la Comisión Nacional del Agua (Conagua), este 10 de mayo se mantendrá la segunda onda de calor de la temporada, sofocando el festejo del Día de las Madres. Con temperaturas elevadas que podrían generar problemas de salud a la población, Sinaloa tendría cielo parcialmente nublado durante el día y un clima extremadamente caluroso por la tarde. Con viento del oeste y suroeste de 10 a 25 km/h con rachas de hasta 45 km/h en Sinaloa. Aunque la Conagua pronostica temperaturas de hasta 45°C en el boletín de las 18:00 horas de este 9 de mayo, en su portal de "Pronóstico del Tiempo por Municipio" la temperatura máxima indica que tres municipios alcanzarán los 42°C, estos en la zona centro del estado. Es importante mencionar que las temperaturas podrían variar ligeramente en algunas zonas. Se recomienda estar atento a los avisos y [pronósticos del Servicio Meteorológico Nacional](https://smn.conagua.gob.mx/es/) para obtener información actualizada. Por lo anterior, ante el pronóstico de altas temperaturas, las autoridades recomiendan tomar las precauciones debidas para evitar repercusiones en la salud. A continuación, un desglose detallado del pronóstico del clima por municipios: -Ahome: Cielo nublado, máxima de 39°C, mínima de 20°C, viento Noroeste con rachas de 28 km/h. -El Fuerte: Cielo nublado, máxima de 39°C, mínima de 22°C, viento Oeste con rachas de 20 km/h. -Choix: Cielo nublado, máxima de 39°C, mínima de 19°C, viento Suroeste con rachas de 17 km/h. -Guasave: Cielo nublado, máxima de 41°C, mínima de 22°C, viento Noroeste con rachas de 36 km/h. -Sinaloa: Cielo nublado, máxima de 42°C, mínima de 22°C, viento Oeste con rachas de 36 km/h. -Angostura: Cielo nublado, máxima de 39°C, mínima de 21°C, viento Noroeste con rachas de 44 km/h. -Salvador Alvarado: Cielo nublado, máxima de 42°C, mínima de 21°C, viento Oeste con rachas de 36 km/h. -Mocorito: Cielo nublado, máxima de 42°C, mínima de 21°C, viento Oeste con rachas de 36 km/h. -Badiraguato: Cielo nublado, máxima de 41°C, mínima de 20°C, viento Oeste con rachas de 23 km/h. -Culiacán: Cielo despejado, máxima de 40°C, mínima de 20°C, viento Oeste con rachas de 24 km/h. -Navolato: Cielo nublado, máxima de 40°C, mínima de 21°C, viento Noroeste con rachas de 41 km/h. -Elota: Cielo nublado, máxima de 33°C, mínima de 22°C, viento Noroeste con rachas de 42 km/h. -Cosalá: Cielo nublado, máxima de 40°C, mínima de 21°C, viento Noreste con rachas de 18 km/h. -San Ignacio: Cielo medio nublado, máxima de 41°C, mínima de 22°C, viento Este con rachas de 20 km/h. -Mazatlán: Cielo poco nuboso, máxima de 30°C, mínima de 22°C, viento noroeste con rachas de 40 km/h. -Concordia: Cielo poco nuboso, máxima de 39°C, mínima de 20°C, viento Suroeste con rachas de 16 km/h. -Rosario: Cielo poco nuboso, máxima de 36°C, mínima de 20°C, viento Suroeste con rachas de 15 km/h. -Escuinapa: Cielo poco nuboso, máxima de 37°C, mínima de 20°C, viento oeste con rachas de 19 km/h. - ¿No te has dado una vuelta por Amazon? Mira en [ESTE ENLACE](https://amzn.to/3XYIf6Z)sus mejores productos [Síguenos en](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAqBwgKMI66_wowu_H4Ag?utm_source=nota_standard&utm_medium=fullamp&utm_campaign=banner_googlenews) Comparte esta noticia Los editores recomiendan - {{#section-name}} [{{section-name}}]({{section-url}}){{/section-name}} [{{title-article}}]({{link-url}}) {{/news}}

author: 智通财经网
title: 新加坡船舶经纪商Vantage(VNTG.US)下限定价4美元/股，募资1300万美元|新加坡_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
Vantage(VNTG.US)是一家总部位于新加坡的船舶经纪服务提供商，业务专攻油轮领域。近日，该公司以每股4美元的发行价发售325万股普通股，募资规模达1300万美元。此次定价位于此前公布的4至5美元发行价区间下限，按发行价计算，公司估值约为1.25亿美元。
Vantage的前身Vantage Shipbrokers成立于2012年，最初专注于清洁石油产品(CPP)及石化产品的油轮运输中介服务。随着市场需求演变，公司逐步将业务拓展至污染石油产品(DPP)、生物燃料及植物油运输领域。
作为行业中介，Vantage连接石油公司、贸易商、船东与商业管理方，提供合同谈判、货物交付协调、运营咨询及滞期费结算等全流程服务。目前，Vantage在新加坡和迪拜设有运营中心，并计划未来在休斯顿和日内瓦开设新办事处，以强化全球服务网络。
据了解，Vantage 即将在纽约证券交易所美国证券交易所上市，股票代码定为 VNTG。此次交易中，Network 1 Financial Securities 承担独家账簿管理人这一关键角色。

author: @libero_official
title: Iker Casillas dà scandalo: la sua nuova fiamma è una star di OnlyFans. Eccola... - Libero Quotidiano
text:
30 gennaio 2025 a a a L'ultima prodezza di Iker Casillas si chiama Claudia Bavel. L'ex portiere del real Madrid e della Nazionale spagnola continua a riempire le prime pagine dei giornali di gossip iberici. Già da quando difendeva la porta delle Merengues, aveva fatto parlare di sé per via della relazione con la giornalista Sara Carbonero. Memorabile quel bacio rubato durante un'intervista dopo che aveva appena conquistato la Coppa del Mondo. Poi la rottura e quel coming out ritrattato. Casillas aveva rivelato sui social di essere omosessuale, salvo poi fare marcia indietro sostenendo che gli avessero hackerato il profilo.
Claudia Bavel , la sua nuova fiamma, non è una giornalista. La ragazza è una giovane content creator per adulti e sta spopolando con contenuti sexy sia su OnlyFans che sui maggiori siti a luci rosse . La coppia è stata pizzicata insieme a un evento tenutosi a metà gennaio dove hanno partecipato anche altri ex giocatori del Real Madrid.
Visualizza questo post su Instagram Un post condiviso da (@imclaudiabavel)
Casillas e Bavel sono stati visti uscire insieme dallo stesso hotel nella mattinata seguente. Nel pomeriggio, sia Iker che Claudia sono partiti per l'evento in cantina con Figo e Salgado, trascorrendo la serata fino quasi a mezzanotte quando sono tornati in hotel.
"Sbattuta contro un palo": il dramma di Manuela Bassani, la star di OnlyFans | Guarda

author: Brett Davis
title: Porsche Taycan development hits final testing stage - PerformanceDrive
text:
The highly anticipated Porsche Taycan is now undergoing its final development and testing stages before it enters production and hits the market. It will come in as Porsche’s first dedicated electric model.
Engineers are putting together the final touches on the driving dynamics by test driving prototypes on snow and ice in Sweden. On the other side of the globe, engineers are also conducting performance tests in South Africa and in Dubai, doing endurance runs in extreme heat.
Overall, testing has accumulated around six million kilometres, with two million attributed to endurance-type testing. All of this has been carried out in 30 countries, including the USA, China and UAE, in temperatures as low as -35 degrees Celsius and as high as 50 degrees. Speaking about the testing, vice president of the model line, Stefan Weckbach, said:
“After carrying out computer simulations and comprehensive bench tests early on, we have now reached the final phase of this demanding testing programme. Before the Taycan is launched on the market at the end of the year, we will have covered approximately six million kilometres across the globe. We are already very happy with the current status of the vehicles. The Taycan is going to be a true Porsche.”
Unlike testing of conventional combustion engine vehicles, Porsche says it has had to pay particular attention on charging the battery and managing temperature control. The electric powertrain can generate a lot of heat for the interior and battery system under extreme conditions, but engineers are fine-tuning these areas to ensure they live up to the company’s pinnacle standards.
Other testing highlights include extensive driving in humidity ranges from 20 per cent to 100 percent, from altitudes of 85 metres to 3000m above sea level, as well as undergoing over 100,000 charging cycles using various charging facilities around the global. Around 1000 test drivers and engineers have assisted with the development progress.
The Porsche Taycan will go on sale later this year. It will come in as something of a Tesla Model S rival, although it will offer superior handling and likely superior quality and engineering. Initial specifications suggest a 0-100km/h time of under 3.5 seconds, with around 440kW on tap thanks to its 800V electric platform. The range is penned in at 500km (NEDC cycle).

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Hamas has accepted a cease-fire deal proposed by Egypt and Qatar
text:
By Vincent Ni, Lauren Frayer ,
4 hours ago
Makeshift tents for displaced Palestinians at a temporary camp in Rafah, southern Gaza, on May 3. (Ahmad / Bloomberg/Getty Images) TEL AVIV, Israel — Hamas has accepted a proposal from Egypt and Qatar for a cease-fire in its seven-month war with Israel, the Palestinian group said in a statement Monday.
The announcement came hours after Israel ordered tens of thousands of displaced Palestinians to evacuate parts of southern Gaza, signaling a ground assault might be imminent.
It is not immediately clear what the proposal entails, nor what Israel's position is. An Israeli official told local TV that the Israeli government was "checking which formula Hamas has agreed to."
In a statement late Monday, Hamas said its top leader, Ismail Haniyeh, had informed Qatar's prime minister and Egypt's intelligence minister "of the Hamas movement's approval of their proposal regarding the cease-fire agreement."
The announcement on Monday — on the eve of the Gaza war's seven-month mark — raised hopes for some that the fighting may come to a pause.
This is a developing story, which will be updated.
Copyright 2024 NPR
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: Admin
title: Jewish Lobbyists Seek to Silence Christians — Removing religion as a defence for hate speech is worth examining, antisemitism envoy tells MPs
text:
Removing religion as a defence for hate speech is worth examining, antisemitism envoy tells MPs
The Criminal Code states people shouldn’t be convicted of the willful promotion of hatred or antisemitism if, ‘in good faith,’ they expressed an opinion ‘on a religious subject’
Author of the article:
The Canadian Press
Stephanie Taylor
Published May 23, 2024 • 4 minute read
46 Comments
Article content
OTTAWA — Canada’s special envoy for combating antisemitism is “very interested” in exploring the idea of removing religion as a possible defence against hate speech charges, she said Thursday, raising concern about creating a possible chill on religious expression.
Deborah Lyons, whose title also includes preserving Holocaust remembrance, made the comment before a parliamentary committee that is studying antisemitism on university campuses.
“I am very interested in exploring (it) as an option because I think, frankly, we are seeing it used in this country and in other places as a defence that frankly does not stand the ground in these very difficult times,” she testified Thursday.
Still, Lyons said she is not ready to offer a final opinion on the matter, and is still discussing it with Justice Department officials.
Jewish leaders, students and faculty have for months been voicing concerns over an increase in hate speech and violence since the beginning of the Israel-Hamas war last fall.
Lyons said she believes universities’ equity, diversity and inclusion strategies are “failing Jews in this country” because they don’t make much mention of antisemitism specifically.
Her office is working to develop better training to counter anti-Jewish discrimination, which she hopes institutions, including governments, will use.
Members of Parliament also asked Lyons about the role police and prosecutors play in laying hate speech related charges, and whether Criminal Code changes are needed.
They pointed to a recent decision by Quebec prosecutors not to charge Montreal imam Adil Charkaoui over comments said during a prayer — a scenario Lyons says she is discussing with the government.
The comments were delivered at a pro-Palestinian demonstration in Montreal, and led to a complaint alleging threats and incitement of violence, which was investigated by the RCMP.
Leading a prayer in Arabic, Charkaoui had called on God to “take care of aggressor Zionists,” adding “O God, don’t leave any of them.”
Last week the province’s director of public prosecutions announced that a committee of three Crown attorneys found the evidence insufficient to prove beyond a reasonable doubt that the words amounted to an incitement of hatred toward an identifiable group, as defined in the Criminal Code.
Using the case as an example, Bloc Quebecois MP Rheal Fortin asked Lyons whether she supports his party’s proposal to eliminate a section of the Criminal Code that allows the use of religious beliefs or a religious text as a defence against the promotion of hatred and antisemitism.
The Criminal Code states that people shouldn’t be convicted of the willful promotion of hatred or antisemitism — defined as downplaying or denying the Holocaust — if, “in good faith,” they expressed an opinion “on a religious subject” or “based on a belief in a religious text.”
Fortin says his party wants to ban “exceptions” to hate speech based on religion.
“Certainly I think that it’s something we’ve got to continue to examine,” Lyons said.
Justice Minister Arif Virani’s office did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
He is already seeking to increase the punishments for existing hate-related offences — including increasing the maximum consequence for advocating genocide to life imprisonment — in the Liberals’ legislation against online harms, tabled back in February.
The stiffer criminal justice reforms have fallen under harsh scrutiny from critics, including civil liberty advocacy groups, who say it could stifle free speech. Justice officials say criminal charges would only be laid in the most extreme examples.
Removing religion as a possible defence to a hate speech charge would likely be welcomed by those who oppose religion, but would create “genuine fear” for those who have deeply held religious beliefs about what they could say in the public square, said Rev. Dr. Andrew Bennett, who works at the public policy think tank Cardus.
“Often, religious people privatize their faith because they’re afraid that if I speak about what I believe, in good faith, in the public square, I’m going to be cancelled, or I’m going to be shut down,” said Bennett, Cardus’s faith communities program director.
He says if a “chill” is placed on religious expression it risks marginalizing a sizeable part of the population, including many new Canadians for whom “religion is not just some sort of cultural relic” but “informs all aspects of society.”
“In many cases, they’ve come here because of the religious freedom we enjoy, and so to then say to those new Canadians in particular, ‘Oh, by the way, you can’t speak about your religion publicly for fear of being censured,’ I think that’s a very bad message to send.”
Bennett said the debate raises questions of how hate is defined and what makes a hateful view “different from a peacefully-held opinion that someone might profoundly disagree with?”
Charkaoui’s comments were “perhaps one of the most egregious offences that I have seen” he told Thursday’s committee.
Mendicino, a former prosecutor who previously served as public safety minister, also cited other examples of demonstrators chanting offensive language, including glorifying Hamas’s Oct. 7 attacks.
He believes “Zionists” fit the Criminal Code’s definition of an identifiable group, which refers to “any section of the public distinguished by colour, race, religion, national or ethnic origin, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or mental or physical disability.”

author: 中国质量新闻网
title: 江苏省淮安市盱眙县市场监督管理局"你点我检"进校园
text:
中国质量新闻网讯 为进一步筑牢校园食品安全防线，切实保障广大师生的饮食健康安全，近日，江苏省淮安市盱眙县市场监督管理局联合检测中心走进盱眙技师学院，为师生们带来了一场别开生面的“你点我检”食品安全现场检测活动。
活动现场，醒目的二维码展板吸引了众多师生驻足“扫码就能选自己关心的食品，真有意思”。在工作人员引导下，大家通过手机扫描二维码，在蔬菜、肉类等类别中自主投票，选择自己最关注的抽检项目。
现场根据师生意见，对师生提供的食堂购买的蔬菜、瓜果进行了农药残留检测。“亲眼看到检测过程，我们吃得更放心了”一名学生感慨道。活动现场同时发放食品安全宣传手册200余份，围绕食品选购、储存、消费维权等知识进行科普。此次“你点我检”进校园活动，不仅丰富了同学们的食品安全知识，提高了师生的食品安全意识，还为构建校园食品安全“防护网”奠定了坚实基础。
下一步，盱眙县市场监督管理局将持续开展“你点我检服务惠民生”进社区、进超市等活动，广泛收集群众意见，聚焦群众关心关切的食品安全问题进行抽检，不断提高风险监测、防控能力，切实保障人民群众“舌尖上的安全”。（来源：淮安市市场监管局）
